thread.section_title: Park Lane Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great Value, Comfortable and Stylish Room
thread.title_full: Great Value, Comfortable and Stylish Room - Review of Park Lane Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: DCGuy3000
title: Great Value, Comfortable and Stylish Room
text: This hotel really covers everything, proximity to Central Park, good accommodations, and the room was well-sized with modern bathrooms. This didn't feel like your usual mini NY experience. The service was friendly, even in a crowded entrance. Got my cabs quickly and had many food options nearby. Wifi worked well. I paid about $150 total for my room.
